body:
This is actually based on a true story
https://www.koreaboo.com/stories/female-police-office-love-yakuza-gangster-arrested/
gangster is an absolute sigma. He's on that grind, convinced a cop to become his fuck buddy, and cucked the other cop. Absolute mad lad.
Good ending the dumb bitch actually got punished
Oh i remember someone said in the comment that this one is based from real story.
MercyFire35 and ImTired should learn what NTR means. As always, there's way too many dumbasses who think that NTR = cheating. There's a reason why those tags are separated.

man, the guy is just plain stupid, how come this is a ntr when she wasnt even his in the first place. its just crush and they are not even in a relationship. Grow up dude, if she chose to ruined her life by fucking the gangster(that would get tired of her eventually) then the perfect revenge would be to live a good life and never looked back.
Well they showed the outcome of these situations at least. Is this really ntr, weren't even dating and no one confessed? He liked her yeah, but that is stretching it.
So she didn't  go to jail?
Please, translate more of this artist... but i have to say this, his comics have the most shitty MC's ever, all of them: pussies

This reminds me of a tangential blackpill.  Many attractive prisoners are very high smv regardless of their crimes.  Shows basic lookism pretty well.  Attractive prisoners recieve lower sentences than ugly ones by over double the sentence for the same crimes.
